name: Cant Be Reasoned With
description:
You are an expendable soldier sent on behalf of a corporate nation to plant what you are led to believe is an explosive into the heart of a massive alien hive. You are told this is because the aliens are a threat. But in truth, they are simply trying to keep themselves alive. They know that the device truly is: A psychic emitter that will destroy their free will and control their bodies. You are the last survivor of your squad. You must survive long enough for the device to arm itself, lest you be overwhelmed by the seething masses of insects. 

You cannot be bargained with

You cannot be reasoned with

You will not stop until every bug is dead 

Controls:

Click 'g' to enter Building mode Use the Arrows to chose a spot '1' and '2' to switch between sniper and normal and left click to place the building
